job.title: Junior Software Engineer, Full Stack
job.description: Welcome is a Webbyaward winning virtual event platform that enables a single person to produce a jawdropping experience that feels like an interactive TV show Welcome is on a mission to provide access to create equitable experiences that connect transport and engage people like never before Were a wellfunded Silicon Valley startup backed by top VCs Our founders investors and advisors are from Google Facebook Yahoo InstaCart Dropbox Slack and morebrbrThis is an incredible opportunity for a new graduate or junior level engineer to have mentorship and coaching from a group of passionate and talented senior team members We are growing insanely fast and looking for a strong fullstack software engineer to join our worldclass team match the tsunami of demand we are already experiencing and help us grow even fasterbrbrYou want your code to have significant and measurable positive impact You love bringing people together Your happiness comes from the joy of others and you look forward to building standout moments of delight into the Welcome experience You are a keen problem solver and team player You take pride in the craftsmanship of your work and appreciate when it is rewarded our customers are fine with fewer features but are not okay with broken features The Junior Software Engineer opportunity at Welcome encompasses architecture design implementation and testing to ensure we build and release products in a way that upholds the luxury quality of our brandbrbrA day in the life of a Junior Fullstack Software Engineer at Welcome includesbrulliBeing a part of an inclusive collaborative team that embraces healthy discussions and supports each other in their goalsliliDesigning implementing testing and delivering robust and delightful products continuing to keep the Welcome experience bestinclassliliLearning our development process culture and code base providing input and then improving it Continually leave each of these in a better state than when you found itbrliulThe next great Junior Fullstack Software Engineer at Welcome will havebrulliIntermediate knowledge with at least one object oriented programming language Java Javascript C C Ruby Python et al and corresponding web framework Spring Express Rails Django et al Our backend is built in Ruby on RailsliliSolid understanding of web technologies such as JavaScript CSS HTML5 and JSON Our frontend is built in Reactjs and ReduxliliSolid understanding of SQL databases and relational database schema designliliTrack record of being a top performer in current and past jobs relevant andor notrelevant to engineering andor academicallyliliGenuine curiosity of wanting to understand and learn how things work Hackers and tinkerers are encouragedliliEntrepreneurial spirit you are a selfstarter who sees each new project as an exciting challengeliliExcellent written and verbal communication skillsbrbrliulstrong Bonus Points If You Have brstrongulliAt least one internship in a professional software development environment working with other engineers product managers designers and QAsliliExperience building or working knowledge of WebRTC or other audiovideo technologiesliliExperience building or working knowledge of highly concurrent and scalable web applications understanding of performance from the browserDOM to the databasebrbrliulstrong Our Investments In You brstrongulliCompetitive salary and equity compensationliliMedical dental and vision health insuranceliliWellnessfitness amp internet reimbursementsliliTop of the line 13inch Macbook Prolili1000 home office and video conferencing budget not including laptop to create an accessible productive and comfortable work environmentliliOpportunity to work with techs best talent An incredible team with a great blend of hustle productivity and a ton of funliliOpportunities to attend the most highend virtual events in the worldliulYouve made it this far If you think you have what it takes but dont necessarily meet every single point on the job description please still get in touch Let us know why you would be a great addition to Welcome in a personal statementcover letterbrbrWe are composed of a diverse group of entrepreneurs dreamers and builders who believe that exceptional highquality experiences can seamlessly bring people together invite collaboration and provide a meaningful sense of belonging If you align to these principles and have what it takes wed love to hear from youbrbrWelcome embraces diversity and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer As part of our commitment to diversifying our workforce we do not discriminate on the basis of age race sex gender gender identity color religion national origin sexual orientation marital status citizenship veteran status or disability status We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodations to participate in the job application and interview process to perform essential job functions and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment While Welcome supports visa sponsorship sponsorship opportunities may be limited to certain roles and skillsets
